Posts.EditableText: What is the situation with regards to getting transcripts of your game? I am thinking about when beta-testing, and having beta-testers just play through, and the creator get then retrieve the transcript to see what happened. I seem to remember this was too be implemented, but I am not sure how to get it to work. Involved in beta-testing M4u's game, I realised I needed to update a page on the Wiki in other areas, and would like to include this as well. http://quest5.net/wiki/Competition_Entry
Posts.HTML:
What is the situation with regards to getting transcripts of your game? I am thinking about when beta-testing, and having beta-testers just play through, and the creator get then retrieve the transcript to see what happened. I seem to remember this was too be implemented, but I am not sure how to get it to work.

Involved in beta-testing M4u's game, I realised I needed to update a page on the Wiki in other areas, and would like to include this as well.
http://quest5.net/wiki/Competition_Entry
